title.narrative: Global Platform Youth Activities in South Financed by Global Contact Course Activities

description.narrative:
Application to the COVID-19 Emergency pool (Nødpulje).
The goal of the Global Platforms is capacity building and mobilising of local youth. The platforms work as central hubs for youth organisations and local young people who can meet, find support and politically engage in a safe environment.
The grant is given to the organisation due to their application to the COVID-19 Emergency Pool (Nødpulje) in order for the organisation to continue their Global Platforms activities. Due to COVID-19 restrictions, planned development activities are in risk of closure, which would negatively affect results.

Capacity building and engagement of local youth in political and social change processes.
Innovative courses in human rights, global citizenship, campaign building, entrepreneurship, activism, organization.
Engage local youth in a global network of peer-support in order to create global opportunities for action.
